Nightlight::


Nightlight smiled but suddenly her expresion changed "I've forgot 
that... nobody has shown me the base... with the fight against Preds 
and all time that I've been in Cr I forgot that... " She looked a bit 
embarrassed







--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> "Yes. Nightlight find him a room please. And if you need anything 
Vampirtron I'm sure everyone will be willing to help."
